name: AeotecAutoPilot
0:
”Alexa, turn on kitchen light.”
”Alexa, brighten livingroom light.”
”Alexa, set master bedroom thermostat to 22 degree.”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
With Alexa skill installed and enabled, AutoPilot moves beyond automated intelligence to perfect, on-demand control. Via voice commands, you’ll be able to control everything from your lights to your outlets and you’ll be able to understand the spaces you’re in.

To use the Aeotec AutoPilot skill you’ll need AutoPilot hardware installed and working in. You’ll also need an Aeotec Id account in order to securely bridge Alexa to AutoPilot. To get started simply use Enable Skill in your Alexa app and log into your Aeotec Id account.
